message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to both of us. Considering the significant importance this product has for you, I propose a transaction price of $1,200,000. This amount reflects the substantial worth of the product while allowing for a mutually beneficial exchange. Should you choose to accept this offer, it would not only secure your acquisition but also ensure a fair return for me. I look forward to discussing the details and potentially closing this deal soon. If you have any questions or need further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.
